title: KubeCon24: VictoriaMetrics' Simpler Alternative to Prometheus
author: Joab Jackson
description: The open source team behind this observability software package take pride in its simplicity and easy scalability.
cntitle: KubeCon24：VictoriaMetrics，Prometheus 的更简单替代方案
cndescription: 此可观测性软件包背后的开源团队以其简单性和易扩展性为荣。
